definition: you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[ni3])
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享頁面時，您可以將用戶指定爲查看者或編輯者。

sentences.english: Your shortstop will never forget about practice again.
sentences.chinese: 您的游擊手將永遠不會忘記的再實踐。

sentences.english: In Los Angeles you need to take a connecting flight to New York.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉磯您需要轉乘中轉聯程航班到紐約。

sentences.english: Yes, we can let you have a single room.
sentences.chinese: 有，我們能給您一間單人房住。

sentences.english: This is the charge for your IDD calls.
Which soup do you want? We have Eggdrop Soup with Sliced Tomatoes, Famous Hot &Sour Soup.
sentences.chinese: 您來點什麼湯？我們有番茄蛋花湯，酸辣湯。

sentences.english: Your intended recipients will be able to unscramble it with ease.
sentences.chinese: 您預期的收件人將能夠輕鬆地解讀它。

sentences.english: Art ceramic tiles add luster to the walls of your kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 藝術瓷磚，使您廚房四壁增輝。

sentences.english: Lafuma added a rubber toe strip to protect you from rocks and roots.
sentences.chinese: 拉弗馬增加了橡膠腳趾地帶，以保護您的岩石和根源。

sentences.english: The shipping charges for returning samples will be added to your final invoice.
sentences.chinese: 運費爲返回的樣品將增加來您最後的發貨票。

sentences.english: As you can see, there are some consequences with the current arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 正如您所看到的，當前這種安排還存有許多問題。

sentences.english: But, you can perform range scans on the remaining columns in the index key.
sentences.chinese: 但是，您可以在索引鍵的其餘列上執行範圍掃面。

sentences.english: She said to call a week to three days before leaving.
sentences.chinese: 請在您要離開前三至七天左右再打電話過來。

sentences.english: This article helps you to add a chat system to your environment.
sentences.chinese: 本文幫助您向您的環境添加了一個聊天系統。

sentences.english: This article helps you to add a chat system to your environment.
sentences.chinese: 本文幫助您向您的環境添加了一個聊天系統。

sentences.english: You'll also strengthen your hip flexors and Achilles tendons.
sentences.chinese: 您還可以增強您的髖屈肌和腳腕筋腱。

definition: you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
polite term for old woman or man
